events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit at all. I would like to request a refund or exchange for a different size as soon as possible.
The customer issue has been identified as a refund request due to size mismatch and dissatisfaction.
Assigning case to refund department agent to handle the customer's refund request promptly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to assist you with your refund or exchange request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in original condition for processing the refund?
The order number is 45879632, and yes, the jacket is unused and still has all tags attached. Let me know what the next steps are.
Thank you! I have initiated the refund process. You should receive an email with the return shipping label shortly, and your refund will be processed after we receive the jacket.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and will send the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund successfully. The amount should reflect in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and if you need any further assistance from our side.
Since your refund has been processed and no further enquiries were received, we are closing your case. Thank you for contacting us.
We have sent a survey to gather your feedback on the refund experience. Please take a moment to help us improve our service.
